pr_title: [ML] Improve assertion on regression alias field test

timeline.message:
[ML] Improve assertion on regression alias field test

Previously the test was asserting the prediction on each document
was close 10.0 from the expected. It turned out that was not enough
as we occasionally saw the test failing by little.

Instead of relaxing that assertion, this commit changes it to
assert the mean prediction error is less than 10.0. This should
reduce the chances of the test failing significantly.

Fixes #60212

timeline.bodyText: I'm wondering if we could drop the Math.abs here. This would of course increase the chance of the assertion in line 564 to pass but maybe it is not necessary.
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: We are interested in how far the prediction is from what we expect. Dropping the abs would mean that 2 errors that are opposite direction would cancel each other out and possibly this could hide the fact that the error is too large.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou
